committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating September 23 through 29, 1979, as "National Voter Education Week".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the week of September 23 through September 29, 1979, as "National Voter Education Week."

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating September 23 through 29, 1979, as "National Voter Education Week".
